tools.name: Azure Arc
tools.description: Microsoft's hybrid cloud platform that extends Azure management and services to any infrastructure, including on-premises, multi-cloud, and edge environments

tools.name: Google Anthos
tools.description: Platform that enables consistent development and operations across hybrid and multi-cloud environments including on-premises, Google Cloud, and other public clouds

tools.name: AWS Outposts
tools.description: Fully managed service that extends AWS infrastructure, services, APIs, and tools to virtually any datacenter, co-location space, or on-premises facility

tools.name: VMware Cloud
tools.description: Platform that delivers consistent infrastructure and operations across private, public, and edge cloud environments

tools.name: IBM Cloud Satellite
tools.description: Distributed cloud solution that enables running IBM Cloud services anywhereâ€”on-premises, at the edge, or in other public clouds

tools.name: HashiCorp Terraform
tools.description: Infrastructure as code tool that enables building, changing, and versioning infrastructure safely and efficiently across multiple cloud providers

tools.name: Kubernetes
tools.description: Open-source container orchestration platform that automates deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications across diverse environments

tools.name: AWS CloudFormation
tools.description: Service for modeling and setting up AWS resources that can be used as part of a multi-cloud strategy with other tools

tools.name: Morpheus
tools.description: Multi-cloud management platform that enables self-service provisioning, governance, and automation across hybrid cloud environments

tools.name: Flexera
tools.description: Cloud management platform that provides visibility, optimization, and governance for hybrid and multi-cloud environments

tools.name: AWS Direct Connect
tools.description: Service that provides dedicated network connections from on-premises data centers to AWS, bypassing the public internet for improved performance and security

tools.name: Azure ExpressRoute
tools.description: Service that creates private connections between Azure data centers and on-premises infrastructure or colocation environments

tools.name: Google Cloud Interconnect
tools.description: Service providing direct physical connections between your on-premises network and Google's network for high-bandwidth, reliable connectivity

tools.name: Cisco CloudCenter
tools.description: Multi-cloud management solution that securely provisions infrastructure resources and deploys applications across different cloud environments

tools.name: AWS Migration Hub
tools.description: Service that provides a single location to track migration tasks across multiple AWS and partner solutions

tools.name: Azure Migrate
tools.description: Service that provides a unified platform to assess and migrate on-premises servers, infrastructure, applications, and data to Azure

tools.name: CloudEndure Migration
tools.description: Service that simplifies, expedites, and automates large-scale migrations from physical, virtual, or cloud infrastructure to AWS

tools.name: VMware HCX
tools.description: Application mobility platform designed for simplifying application migration, workload rebalancing, and business continuity across data centers and clouds

tools.name: Turbonomic
tools.description: Application resource management solution that optimizes workload performance, compliance, and cost across hybrid and multi-cloud environments
